title: Plugging In For $$x$$ and $$y$$
speech: Plugging in  x is equal to 3, comma y is equal to 2 , we get  6 times 3 squared plus 23 times 3 minus 9 times 2 squared

title: Simplifying the Expression
speech: 6 times 3 squared, plus 23 times 3 minus 9 times 2 squared is equal to, 54 plus 18 minus 36, is equal to 36
